revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Bitdefender |model=Box |revision=V1
(AT11021000EN) |upc=5949958006618 |asin=B074T7LQLL |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=199 |est_release_date=04/2015 |fcc_date=11/27/2014 |fcc_id=2ADJ5-AT11021000EN, Z9W-CM2 |ic_id=12484A-AT11021000 |pcb_id=BDHW-TBX-REVC |type=wireless router, security appliance |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128BVEG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6JB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_module=8devices Carambola 2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.49; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui=E8:44:7E |oui_eth=E8:44:7E }} {{TagLine|Bitdefender BOX Smart Cybersecurity Hub}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.bitdefender.com/box/}} {{â€¢}} [https://www.amazon.com/stores/node/3019130011 ''Amazon''] *[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MkDQgRR2_NE ''SlyFoxSecurity - BitDefender Box Teardown'' on '''YouTube'''] :"BDHW-TBX-REVC" is silkscreened on the board. ===Reviews=== * [https://www.tomsguide.com/us/bitdefender-box,review-3766.html ''Bitdefender Box Review'' on '''Tom's Guide'''] * [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/33129-bitdefender-box-reviewed ''Bitdefender Box Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atheros]]'' AR9331 @400MHz (MIPS 24K) *Memory: 64MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 16MB SPI NOR Flash *Network: 2x Fast Ethernet port *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR9331 (802.11bgn) *Power Source: USB Female Micro-B ==Images== Bitdefender Box V1 Top.jpeg|Board Top Bitdefender Box V1 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] ---- __NOTOC__
